ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They have devised a monstrous thing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You have uttered a grievous thing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Surely you have made a monstrous statement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is certainly a monstrous lie!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You have indeed brought an extremely grave speech!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Indeed you have brought forth (said) a thing Idda.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Certainly you have made an abominable assertion
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: You have indeed advanced something hideous!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Assuredly ye utter a disastrous thing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Assuredly, you have uttered a monstrous falsehood:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Assuredly ye have brought a thing monstrous. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You have certainly advanced something hideous!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Indeed ye have put forth a thing most monstrous!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Indeed you have brought forth (said) a terrible evil thing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Surely, you have brought a monstrous thing!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You have come up with something monstrous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You have done an atrocious thing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:89] Truly you have uttered something hideous, that is, a great abomination.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Assuredly you utter a disastrous thing) you utter ignominious evil words,
